com.l8smartlight.sdk.android

Interface AndroidL8ManagerListener


  • public interface AndroidL8ManagerListener
    You have to implement this interface if you want to receive events from AndroidL8Manager.
    Author:
    smartlight inc

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allConnectionsDone()
      Connection process has finished with registered L8 devices.
      void bluetoothNotAvailable()
      Bluetooth is not available in your device
      void bluetoothNotEnabled()
      Bluetooth is not active in your device.
      void deviceConnected(L8 l8)
      A device has been connected.
      void deviceDisconnected(L8 l8)
      Connection lost with L8.
      void noDevicesConnected()
      Your device is not connected with any l8 device.
      void noDevicesRegistered()
      there are not registered L8 devices.
      void simulatorRequested(L8 l8, boolean newSimulator)
      AndroidL8Manager provides a simulator previously requested by user.

    • Method Detail

      • bluetoothNotAvailable

        void bluetoothNotAvailable()
        Bluetooth is not available in your device

      • bluetoothNotEnabled

        void bluetoothNotEnabled()
        Bluetooth is not active in your device.

      • noDevicesRegistered

        void noDevicesRegistered()
        there are not registered L8 devices.

      • deviceConnected

        void deviceConnected(L8 l8)
        A device has been connected.
        Parameters:

      • deviceDisconnected

        void deviceDisconnected(L8 l8)
        Connection lost with L8.
        Parameters:
        l8 - L8 device

      • noDevicesConnected

        void noDevicesConnected()
        Your device is not connected with any l8 device.

      • allConnectionsDone

        void allConnectionsDone()
        Connection process has finished with registered L8 devices. At least one L8 is connected to you.

      • simulatorRequested

        void simulatorRequested(L8 l8,
                      boolean newSimulator)
        AndroidL8Manager provides a simulator previously requested by user.
        Parameters:
        l8 - L8 virtual device.
        newSimulator - newSimulator is true if has not been created before.
